Instructions:  
• In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.  
• Brown chicken thighs on all sides, then set aside.  
• Sauté onion and garlic until softened.  
• Stir in cumin, cinnamon, and turmeric, then add chicken broth, apricots, and olives.  
• Return chicken to the pot, cover, and simmer for 45 minutes until tender.  
• Season with salt and pepper.  
• Garnish with parsley and serve over couscous.  
 
 
 
Mushroom Risotto  
Ingredients:  
• 1 cup Arborio rice  
• 4 cups chicken or vegetable broth  
• 1 small onion, diced  
• 2 cloves garlic, minced  
• 1 cup mushrooms, sliced  
• 1/2 cup white wine  
• 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese  
• 2 tablespoons butter  
• 2 tablespoons olive oil  
• Salt and pepper to taste  
• Chopped parsley for garnish  
Instructions:  
• Heat broth in a pot and keep warm.  
• In a large skillet, heat olive oil and 1 tablespoon butter over medium heat.  
• Sauté onion, garlic, and mushrooms until tender.  
• Add rice and stir for 1 -2 minutes until lightly toast ed. 
• Pour in white wine and cook until absorbed.  
• Add warm broth, one ladle at a time, stirring until absorbed before adding more, until 
rice is creamy and tender (about 20 minutes).  
• Stir in remaining butter and Parmesan cheese, season with salt and pepper.  
• Garnish with parsley and serve.  
 
 
 
Pulled Pork Sandwiches  
Ingredients:  
• 2 pounds pork shoulder  
• 1 small onion, sliced  
• 2 cloves garlic, minced
extracted_text.8:
• 1 cup barbecue sauce  
• 1/2 cup chicken broth  
• 1 tablespoon brown sugar  
• 1 teaspoon smoked paprika  
• Salt and pepper to taste  
• Buns for serving  
• Coleslaw for topping (optional)  
Instructions:  
• Season pork shoulder with salt, pepper, and smoked paprika.  
• Place onion and garlic in a slow cooker, then add pork.  
• Mix barbecue sauce, chicken broth, and brown sugar, and pour over pork.  
• Cook on low for 8 hours or high for 4 hours until pork shreds easily.  
• Shred pork with forks and mix with sauce.  
• Serve on buns with coleslaw if desired.  
 
 
 
Stuffed Chicken Breasts  
Ingredients:  
• 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts  
• 1/2 cup spinach, chopped  
• 1/2 cup feta cheese, crumbled  
• 1/4 cup sun -dried tomatoes, chopped  
• 2 cloves garlic, minced  
• 2 tablespoons olive oil  
• Salt and pepper to taste  
Instructions:  
• Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).  
• Cut a pocket into each chicken breast.  
• In a bowl, mix spinach, feta, sun -dried tomatoes, and garlic.  
• Stuff the mixture into the chicken pockets and secure with toothpicks if needed.  
• Season chicken with salt and pepper.  
• Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat and sear chicken on both sides.  
• Transfer to a baking dish and ba ke for 20 -25 minutes until cooked through.  
• Serve warm.  
 
 
 
Vegetable Lasagna  
Ingredients:  
• 9 lasagna noodles, cooked  
• 1 small onion, diced  
• 2 cloves garlic, minced  
• 1 zucchini, sliced
extracted_text.9:
• 1 bell pepper, diced  
• 1 cup spinach, chopped  
• 1 jar (24 ounces) marinara sauce  
• 1 can (15 ounces) ricotta cheese  
• 1 egg  
• 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese  
• 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese  
• 2 tablespoons olive oil  
• Salt and pepper to taste  
Instructions:  
• Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).  
• In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Sauté onion , garlic, zucchini, and bell pepper 
until tender. Add spinach and cook until wilted.  
• In a bowl, mix ricotta cheese, egg, salt, and pepper.  
• In a baking dish, spread a thin layer of marinara sauce. Layer 3 noodles, half the ricotta 
mixture, half the vegetabl es, and 1/3 of the mozzarella. Repeat layers.  
• Top with remaining noodles, marinara sauce, mozzarella, and Parmesan cheese.  
• Cover with foil and bake for 25 minutes. Remove foil and bake for another 20 minutes 
until bubbly.  
• Let stand for 10 minutes before se rving.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups black -eyed peas
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1 teaspoon salt
o Oil for frying

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Soak black -eyed peas overnight, then peel and rinse.
o Blend peas with diced onion, minced garlic, and salt until smooth.
o Form mixture into balls and fry in hot oil until golden.
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 block tofu
o 1/4 cup cornstarch
o 1 cup dashi broth
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce
o 1 tablespoon mirin
o 1/4 cup green onions
o 1/4 cup grated daikon

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Cut tofu into cubes and coat with cornstarch.
o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Heat dashi broth with soy sauce and mirin.
o Serve tofu in broth, topped with green onions and grated daikon.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 potatoes
o 1 cauliflower
o 1 small on ion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1 teaspoon cumin
o 1 teaspoon turmeric
o 1 teaspoon coriander
o 1 teaspoon garam masala
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 2 tablespoons oil

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Peel and dice potatoes, cut cauliflower into florets.
o Heat oil in a pan and sauté diced onion and minced garlic until translucent.
o Add cumin, turmeric, coriander, and garam masala, cook for 1 minute.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1/2 pound ground beef
o 1/2 pound ground pork
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs
o 1 egg
o 1 teaspoon paprika
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 cup tomato sauce

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix ground beef, ground pork, diced onion, minced garlic, breadcrumbs, beaten
egg, paprika, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
o Form mixture into meatballs.
o Heat olive oil in a pan and brown meatballs on all sides.
o Add tomato sauce and simmer for 20 minutes.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o Assorted cured meats (salami, prosciutto)
o Cheeses (mozzarella, provolone)
o Olives
o Marinated vegetables (artichokes, peppers)
o Breadsticks

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Arrange meats, cheeses, olives, and vegetables on a platter.
o Serve with breadsticks.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups cooked risotto
o 1/2 cup mozzarella
o 1/2 cup flour
o 2 eggs
o 1 cup breadcrumbs
o 1 cup vegetable oil

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Form risotto into balls and stuff with a cube of mozzarella.
o Dredge balls in flour, dip in beaten eggs, and coat with breadcrumbs .
o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 eggplants
o 1/4 cup tahini
o 1/4 cup lemon juice
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Roast eggplants until soft, then peel and mash.
o Blend mashed eggplant, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food
processor.
o Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth.
o Serve with a drizzle of olive oil.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 cups cooked navy beans
o 1 small onion
o 1/2 cup molasses
o 1/4 cup brown sugar
o 1/4 cup ketchup
o 1 tablespoon mustard
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
o Sauté diced onion until translucent.
o Mix beans, onion, molasses, brown sugar, ketchup, mustard, salt, and pepper in a
baking dish.
o Bake for 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups grated cassava
o 1/4 cup coconut milk
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix grated cassava with coconut milk and salt.
o Form mixture into flat cakes.
o Fry in  hot oil until golden.
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content: o Assorted small side dishes like pickled radish, spinach, bean sprouts, kimchi

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Prepare each side dish separately.
o Arrange on small plates.
o Serve as accompaniments to the main meal.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup rice flour
o 1/2 cup water
o 1/2 cup coconut milk
o 1/4 cup shrimp
o 1/4 cup green onions
o 1/4 cup fried shallots
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon sugar

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix rice flour, water, coconut milk, sal t, and sugar to form a batter.
o Pour batter into small dishes and steam until set.
o Sauté chopped shrimp and green onions until cooked.
o Top steamed cakes with shrimp, green onions, and fried shallots.
o Serve with dipping sauce.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup rice flour
o 1/2 cup coconut milk
o 1/2 cup water
o 1/2 pound shrimp
o 1/2 pound pork
o 1 small onion
o 1/2 cup bean sprouts
o 1/4 cup green onions
o 1/4 cup cilantro
o 1 teaspoon turmeric

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix rice flour, coconut milk, water, tur meric, and salt to form a batter.
o Sauté sliced pork, shrimp, and diced onion until cooked.
o Heat oil in a pan and pour in a ladle of batter, swirling to coat the pan.
o Add cooked pork, shrimp, bean sprouts, green onions, and cilantro.
o Fold pancake in half an d cook until crispy.
o Serve with lettuce and dipping sauce.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound beef tenderloin
o 1/4 cup paprika
o 2 tablespoons cumin
o 2 tablespoons fenugreek
o 1 tablespoon garlic powder
o 1 tablespoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Rub beef with salt and let cure  in the refrigerator for 24 hours.
o Rinse and pat dry.
o Mix paprika, cumin, fenugreek, and garlic powder, then coat beef with the
mixture.
o Wrap in cheesecloth and hang in a cool, dry place for 1 -2 weeks.
o Slice thinly and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast
o 1 teaspoon sugar
o 1 cup warm water
o 3 cups flour
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/4 cup olive oil

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy.
o Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture and olive oil.
o Knead  until smooth, then let rise until doubled.
o Divide dough into balls and roll out into circles.
o Cook on a hot griddle until puffed and golden.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Wash and dry okra, then cut into pieces.
o Heat oil in a pan and sauté diced onion and minced garlic until translucent.
o Add cumin, coriander, turmeric, and garam masala, cook for 1 minute.
o Add okra and stir to coat with spices.
o Cook until okra is tender, stirring occasionally.
o Add salt to taste and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound ground beef
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup raisins
o 1/4 cup almonds
o 1 tablespoon curry powder
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper
o 2 eggs
o 1/2 cup milk
o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic until softened.
o Add ground beef, raisins, almonds, curry powder, salt, and  pepper, cook until
beef is browned.
o Transfer mixture to a baking dish.
o Beat eggs with milk and pour over the beef mixture.
o Sprinkle with breadcrumbs.
o Bake for 30 minutes until set and golden.
o Serve warm.
Bok Choy with Garlic

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content: o 1 pound bok choy

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté minced garlic in sesame oil until fragrant.
o Add bok choy and stir -fry until tender.
o Add soy sauce and cook for 2 minutes.
o Serve warm.
Bolinho de Bacalhau

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound salted cod
o 4 potatoes
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup parsley
o 2 eggs
o 1 cup breadcrumbs
o Oil for frying

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Soak salted cod in water overnight, then rinse and flake.
o Boil potatoes until tender, then mash.
o Mix cod with mashed potatoes, d iced onion, minced garlic, chopped parsley, and
beaten eggs.
o Form mixture into balls and coat with breadcrumbs.
o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound fish fillets
o 1/2 pound shrimp
o 1/2 pound  mussels
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 4 tomatoes
o 4 cups fish stock
o 1/2 cup white wine
o 1 teaspoon saffron
o 1 teaspoon thyme
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content: o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 potatoes
o 1 small onion
o 1/4 cup bacon
o 2 tablespoons butter
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Boil potatoes until tender, then slice.
o Cook diced bacon until crispy, then remove and set aside.
o Sauté sliced potatoes and diced onion in butter until golden.
o Stir in bacon, salt, and pepper.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 potatoes
o 2 zucchinis
o 2 eggplants
o 2 tomatoes
o 1 small onion
o 4 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 teaspoon oregano
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
o Slice potatoes, zucchinis, eggplants, and tomatoes.
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened.
o Layer vegetables in a baking dish, seasoning with oregano, salt, and pepper.
o Pour sautéed onion and garlic over the top.
o Bake for 45 minutes unti l vegetables are tender.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content: o 1/2 pound ground beef

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté ground beef, diced onion, and minced garlic until cooked.
o Stir in chopped parsley, cumin, cinnamon, salt, and pepper.
o Cut phyllo dough into strips and brush with melted butter.
o Place a spoonful of filling on each strip and fold into tri angles.
o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 baguette
o 4 tomatoes
o 1/4 cup basil
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Slice baguette and toast until golden.
o Dice tomatoes and  chop basil.
o Mix tomatoes, basil, minced garlic, olive oil, and salt.
o Spoon mixture onto toasted bread and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup bulgur
o 2 cups chicken broth
o 1 small onion
o 1 carrot
o 1/4 cup parsley
o 2 tablespoons olive oil
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté diced onion and grated carrot in olive oil until softened.
o Add bulgur and cook for 2 minutes.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 eggplants
o 2 cloves garlic
o 2 tablespoons fish sauce
o 1 tablespoon lime juice
o 1 tablespoon sugar
o 1/4 cup cilantro

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Grill eggplants until charred and tender.
o Peel and slice eggplants.
o Mix minced garl ic, fish sauce, lime juice, and sugar in a bowl.
o Toss eggplants with the dressing.
o Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound callaloo leaves
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup coconut milk
o 1 teaspoon thyme
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic until softened.
o Add callaloo leaves and cook until wilted.
o Stir in coconut milk, thyme, salt, and pepper.
o Simmer for 10 minutes.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 cups fish stock
o 1/2 pound fish fillets
o 1 cup pineapple
o 1 cup tomatoes
o 1 cup bean sprouts
o 2 stalks lemongrass

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Bring fish stock to a boil.
o Add lemongrass, chilies, and tamarind paste, simmer for 10 minutes.
o Add pineapple, tomatoes, and fish fillets, cook until fish is done.
o Stir in fish sauce, sugar, and bean sprouts.
o Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 tomatoes
o 1 pound fre sh mozzarella
o 1/4 cup basil
o 2 tablespoons olive oil
o 1 tablespoon balsamic glaze
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Slice tomatoes and mozzarella.
o Arrange on a plate, alternating slices.
o Sprinkle with chopped basil, olive oil, balsamic glaze, and salt.
o Serve immediately.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 carrots
o 1/4 cup raisins
o 1/4 cup parsley
o 1/4 cup lemon juice
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 teaspoon cumin
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Grate carrots and mix with raisins and chopped parsley.
o Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, cum in, and salt, then pour over salad.
o Toss well and serve chilled.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound fresh fish or shrimp
o 1 cup lime juice

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Dice fish or shrimp and place in a bowl.
o Pour lime juice over the seafood and let marinate for 30 minutes.
o Dice onion, tomatoes, and jalapeño.
o Chop cilantro.
o Mix all ingredients together and add salt.
o Serve chilled.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 package spring roll wrappers
o 1/2 pound ground pork
o 1/2 cup shrimp
o 1/2 cup mushrooms
o 1/4 cup carrots
o 1/4 cup green onions
o 2 cloves garlic
o 2 tablespoons fish sauce
o 1 tablespoon sugar
o Oil for frying

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix ground pork, chopped shrimp, diced mushrooms, julienned carrots, chopped
green onions, minced gar lic, fish sauce, and sugar in a bowl.
o Place a spoonful of filling on each wrapper and roll tightly.
o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Drain on paper towels and serve with dipping sauce.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 tomatoes
o 2 bell peppers
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 teaspoon cumin
o 1 teaspoon paprika
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 4 eggs
o 1/4 cup cilantro

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté diced onion, minced garlic, and sliced bell peppers in olive oil until
softened.
o Add diced tomatoes, cumin, paprika, and salt, simmer f or 10 minutes.
o Make wells in the sauce and crack eggs into each well.
o Cover and cook until eggs are set.
o Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups cooked chickpeas
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1 teaspoon cumin
o 1 teasp oon coriander
o 1 teaspoon garam masala
o 1 teaspoon turmeric
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1 can diced tomatoes
o 2 tablespoons oil

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Heat oil in a pan and sauté diced onion and minced garlic until translucent.
o Add cumin, coriander, garam masala, and turmeric, cook for 1 minute.
o Add chickpeas and diced tomatoes, stir to combine.
o Simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
o Add salt to taste and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups flour
o 1/4 cup oil
o 1/2 cup water
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix flour, oil, wate r, and salt to form a dough, then let rest.
o Divide dough into balls and roll out into circles.
o Cook on a hot griddle until golden on both sides.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound pork shoulder
o 1/4 cup hoisin sauce
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix hoisin sauce, soy sauce, honey, rice wine, five -spice powder, and garlic
powder in a bowl.
o Marinate pork in the mixture for at least 2 hours.
o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
o Place pork on a baking sheet and roast for 45 minutes, basting occasionally.
o Let rest before slicing and serving.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 eggs
o 1 cup dashi broth
o 1 tablespoon soy sauce
o 1 tablespoon mirin
o 1/4 cup chicken
o 1/4 cup shrimp
o 1/4 cup mushrooms

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Beat eggs with dashi broth, soy sauce, and mirin.
o Place chicken, shrimp, and mushrooms in small bowls.
o Pour egg mixture over the top.
o Steam for 15 minutes until set.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 po blano peppers
o 1 cup shredded cheese
o 1/2 cup flour
o 4 eggs
o 1 cup vegetable oil
o 1 cup tomato sauce

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Roast peppers until charred, then peel and remove seeds.
o Stuff peppers with cheese.
o Separate eggs and beat whites until stiff, then fold in yolks.
o Dredge peppers in flour, then dip in egg mixture.
o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Serve with warmed tomato sauce.

o Arrange on small plates.  
o Serve as accompaniments to the main meal.  
 
Banh Beo  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 cup rice flour  
o 1/2 cup water  
o 1/2 cup coconut milk  
o 1/4 cup shrimp  
o 1/4 cup green onions  
o 1/4 cup fried shallots  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/2 teaspoon sugar  
• Instructions : 
o Mix rice flour, water, coconut milk, sal t, and sugar to form a batter.  
o Pour batter into small dishes and steam until set.  
o Sauté chopped shrimp and green onions until cooked.  
o Top steamed cakes with shrimp, green onions, and fried shallots.  
o Serve with dipping sauce.  
 
Banh Xeo  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 cup rice flour  
o 1/2 cup coconut milk  
o 1/2 cup water  
o 1/2 pound shrimp  
o 1/2 pound pork  
o 1 small onion  
o 1/2 cup bean sprouts  
o 1/4 cup green onions  
o 1/4 cup cilantro  
o 1 teaspoon turmeric
extracted_text.6:
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o Oil for frying  
• Instructions : 
o Mix rice flour, coconut milk, water, tur meric, and salt to form a batter.  
o Sauté sliced pork, shrimp, and diced onion until cooked.  
o Heat oil in a pan and pour in a ladle of batter, swirling to coat the pan.  
o Add cooked pork, shrimp, bean sprouts, green onions, and cilantro.  
o Fold pancake in half an d cook until crispy.  
o Serve with lettuce and dipping sauce.  
 
Basturma  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 pound beef tenderloin  
o 1/4 cup paprika  
o 2 tablespoons cumin  
o 2 tablespoons fenugreek  
o 1 tablespoon garlic powder  
o 1 tablespoon salt  
• Instructions : 
o Rub beef with salt and let cure  in the refrigerator for 24 hours.  
o Rinse and pat dry.  
o Mix paprika, cumin, fenugreek, and garlic powder, then coat beef with the 
mixture.  
o Wrap in cheesecloth and hang in a cool, dry place for 1 -2 weeks.  
o Slice thinly and serve.  
 
Batbout  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast  
o 1 teaspoon sugar  
o 1 cup warm water  
o 3 cups flour  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/4 cup olive oil  
• Instructions : 
o Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy.  
o Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture and olive oil.  
o Knead  until smooth, then let rise until doubled.  
o Divide dough into balls and roll out into circles.  
o Cook on a hot griddle until puffed and golden.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Bhindi Masala  
• Ingredients :
extracted_text.7:
o 1 pound okra  
o 1 small onion  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1 teaspoon cumin  
o 1 teaspoon cor iander  
o 1 teaspoon turmeric  
o 1 teaspoon garam masala  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 2 tablespoons oil  
• Instructions : 
o Wash and dry okra, then cut into pieces.  
o Heat oil in a pan and sauté diced onion and minced garlic until translucent.  
o Add cumin, coriander, turmeric, and garam masala, cook for 1 minute.  
o Add okra and stir to coat with spices.  
o Cook until okra is tender, stirring occasionally.  
o Add salt to taste and serve.  
 
Bobotie  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 pound ground beef  
o 1 small onion  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1/4 cup raisins  
o 1/4 cup almonds  
o 1 tablespoon curry powder  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper  
o 2 eggs  
o 1/2 cup milk  
o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs  
• Instructions : 
o Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).  
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic until softened.  
o Add ground beef, raisins, almonds, curry powder, salt, and  pepper, cook until 
beef is browned.  
o Transfer mixture to a baking dish.  
o Beat eggs with milk and pour over the beef mixture.  
o Sprinkle with breadcrumbs.  
o Bake for 30 minutes until set and golden.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Bok Choy with Garlic  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 pound bok choy
extracted_text.8:
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce  
o 1 tablespoon sesame oil  
• Instructions : 
o Sauté minced garlic in sesame oil until fragrant.  
o Add bok choy and stir -fry until tender.  
o Add soy sauce and cook for 2 minutes.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Bolinho de Bacalhau  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 pound salted cod  
o 4 potatoes  
o 1 small onion  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1/4 cup parsley  
o 2 eggs  
o 1 cup breadcrumbs  
o Oil for frying  
• Instructions : 
o Soak salted cod in water overnight, then rinse and flake.  
o Boil potatoes until tender, then mash.  
o Mix cod with mashed potatoes, d iced onion, minced garlic, chopped parsley, and 
beaten eggs.  
o Form mixture into balls and coat with breadcrumbs.  
o Fry in hot oil until golden.  
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.  
 
Bouillabaisse  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 pound fish fillets  
o 1/2 pound shrimp  
o 1/2 pound  mussels  
o 1 small onion  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 4 tomatoes  
o 4 cups fish stock  
o 1/2 cup white wine  
o 1 teaspoon saffron  
o 1 teaspoon thyme  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper  
• Instructions : 
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened.
extracted_text.9:
o Add diced tomatoes, fish stock, wine, saffron, thyme, salt, and pepper, simmer 
for 20 minutes.  
o Add fish fillets, shrimp, and mussels, cook until seafood is done.  
o Serve hot with crusty bread.  
 
Bratkartoffeln (Fried Potatoes)  
• Ingredients : 
o 4 potatoes  
o 1 small onion  
o 1/4 cup bacon  
o 2 tablespoons butter  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper  
• Instructions : 
o Boil potatoes until tender, then slice.  
o Cook diced bacon until crispy, then remove and set aside.  
o Sauté sliced potatoes and diced onion in butter until golden.  
o Stir in bacon, salt, and pepper.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Briam  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 potatoes  
o 2 zucchinis  
o 2 eggplants  
o 2 tomatoes  
o 1 small onion  
o 4 cloves garlic  
o 1/4 cup olive oil  
o 1 teaspoon oregano  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper  
• Instructions : 
o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).  
o Slice potatoes, zucchinis, eggplants, and tomatoes.  
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened.  
o Layer vegetables in a baking dish, seasoning with oregano, salt, and pepper.  
o Pour sautéed onion and garlic over the top.  
o Bake for 45 minutes unti l vegetables are tender.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Briouats  
• Ingredients : 
o 1/2 pound ground beef
extracted_text.10:
o 1 small onion  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1/4 cup parsley  
o 1 teaspoon cumin  
o 1 teaspoon cinnamon  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper  
o 1 package phyllo dough  
o 1/4 cup butter  
o Oil for frying  
• Instructions : 
o Sauté ground beef, diced onion, and minced garlic until cooked.  
o Stir in chopped parsley, cumin, cinnamon, salt, and pepper.  
o Cut phyllo dough into strips and brush with melted butter.  
o Place a spoonful of filling on each strip and fold into tri angles.  
o Fry in hot oil until golden.  
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.  
 
Bruschetta  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 baguette  
o 4 tomatoes  
o 1/4 cup basil  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1/4 cup olive oil  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
• Instructions : 
o Slice baguette and toast until golden.  
o Dice tomatoes and  chop basil.  
o Mix tomatoes, basil, minced garlic, olive oil, and salt.  
o Spoon mixture onto toasted bread and serve.  
 
Bulgur Pilaf  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 cup bulgur  
o 2 cups chicken broth  
o 1 small onion  
o 1 carrot  
o 1/4 cup parsley  
o 2 tablespoons olive oil  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
• Instructions : 
o Sauté diced onion and grated carrot in olive oil until softened.  
o Add bulgur and cook for 2 minutes.
extracted_text.11:
o Pour in chicken broth and bring to a boil.  
o Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until bulgur is tender.  
o Stir in chopped parsley and salt.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Ca Tim Nuong (Grilled Eggplant)  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 eggplants  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 2 tablespoons fish sauce  
o 1 tablespoon lime juice  
o 1 tablespoon sugar  
o 1/4 cup cilantro  
• Instructions : 
o Grill eggplants until charred and tender.  
o Peel and slice eggplants.  
o Mix minced garl ic, fish sauce, lime juice, and sugar in a bowl.  
o Toss eggplants with the dressing.  
o Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve.  
 
Callaloo  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 pound callaloo leaves  
o 1 small onion  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1/4 cup coconut milk  
o 1 teaspoon thyme  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper  
• Instructions : 
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic until softened.  
o Add callaloo leaves and cook until wilted.  
o Stir in coconut milk, thyme, salt, and pepper.  
o Simmer for 10 minutes.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Canh Chua  
• Ingredients : 
o 4 cups fish stock  
o 1/2 pound fish fillets  
o 1 cup pineapple  
o 1 cup tomatoes  
o 1 cup bean sprouts  
o 2 stalks lemongrass
extracted_text.12:
o 2-3 Thai chilies  
o 2 tablespoons fish sauce  
o 2 tablespoons tamarind paste  
o 1 tablespoon sugar  
o 1/4 cup cilantro  
• Instructions : 
o Bring fish stock to a boil.  
o Add lemongrass, chilies, and tamarind paste, simmer for 10 minutes.  
o Add pineapple, tomatoes, and fish fillets, cook until fish is done.  
o Stir in fish sauce, sugar, and bean sprouts.  
o Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve.  
 
Caprese Salad  
• Ingredients : 
o 4 tomatoes  
o 1 pound fre sh mozzarella  
o 1/4 cup basil  
o 2 tablespoons olive oil  
o 1 tablespoon balsamic glaze  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
• Instructions : 
o Slice tomatoes and mozzarella.  
o Arrange on a plate, alternating slices.  
o Sprinkle with chopped basil, olive oil, balsamic glaze, and salt.  
o Serve immediately.  
 
Carrot Salad  
• Ingredients : 
o 4 carrots  
o 1/4 cup raisins  
o 1/4 cup parsley  
o 1/4 cup lemon juice  
o 1/4 cup olive oil  
o 1 teaspoon cumin  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
• Instructions : 
o Grate carrots and mix with raisins and chopped parsley.  
o Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, cum in, and salt, then pour over salad.  
o Toss well and serve chilled.  
 
Ceviche  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 pound fresh fish or shrimp  
o 1 cup lime juice
extracted_text.13:
o 1 small onion  
o 2 tomatoes  
o 1 jalapeño  
o 1/4 cup cilantro  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
• Instructions : 
o Dice fish or shrimp and place in a bowl.  
o Pour lime juice over the seafood and let marinate for 30 minutes.  
o Dice onion, tomatoes, and jalapeño.  
o Chop cilantro.  
o Mix all ingredients together and add salt.  
o Serve chilled.  
 
Cha Gio  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 package spring roll wrappers  
o 1/2 pound ground pork  
o 1/2 cup shrimp  
o 1/2 cup mushrooms  
o 1/4 cup carrots  
o 1/4 cup green onions  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 2 tablespoons fish sauce  
o 1 tablespoon sugar  
o Oil for frying  
• Instructions : 
o Mix ground pork, chopped shrimp, diced mushrooms, julienned carrots, chopped 
green onions, minced gar lic, fish sauce, and sugar in a bowl.  
o Place a spoonful of filling on each wrapper and roll tightly.  
o Fry in hot oil until golden.  
o Drain on paper towels and serve with dipping sauce.  
 
Chakchouka  
• Ingredients : 
o 4 tomatoes  
o 2 bell peppers  
o 1 small onion  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1/4 cup olive oil  
o 1 teaspoon cumin  
o 1 teaspoon paprika  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 4 eggs  
o 1/4 cup cilantro
extracted_text.14:
• Instructions : 
o Sauté diced onion, minced garlic, and sliced bell peppers in olive oil until 
softened.  
o Add diced tomatoes, cumin, paprika, and salt, simmer f or 10 minutes.  
o Make wells in the sauce and crack eggs into each well.  
o Cover and cook until eggs are set.  
o Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve warm.  
 
Chana Masala  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 cups cooked chickpeas  
o 1 small onion  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1 teaspoon cumin  
o 1 teasp oon coriander  
o 1 teaspoon garam masala  
o 1 teaspoon turmeric  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1 can diced tomatoes  
o 2 tablespoons oil  
• Instructions : 
o Heat oil in a pan and sauté diced onion and minced garlic until translucent.  
o Add cumin, coriander, garam masala, and turmeric, cook for 1 minute.  
o Add chickpeas and diced tomatoes, stir to combine.  
o Simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.  
o Add salt to taste and serve.  
 
Chapati  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 cups flour  
o 1/4 cup oil  
o 1/2 cup water  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
• Instructions : 
o Mix flour, oil, wate r, and salt to form a dough, then let rest.  
o Divide dough into balls and roll out into circles.  
o Cook on a hot griddle until golden on both sides.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Char Siu  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 pound pork shoulder  
o 1/4 cup hoisin sauce  
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce
extracted_text.15:
o 2 tablespoons honey  
o 1 tablespoon rice wine  
o 1 teaspoon five -spice powder  
o 1 teaspoon garlic powder  
• Instructions : 
o Mix hoisin sauce, soy sauce, honey, rice wine, five -spice powder, and garlic 
powder in a bowl.  
o Marinate pork in the mixture for at least 2 hours.  
o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).  
o Place pork on a baking sheet and roast for 45 minutes, basting occasionally.  
o Let rest before slicing and serving.  
 
Chawanmushi  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 eggs  
o 1 cup dashi broth  
o 1 tablespoon soy sauce  
o 1 tablespoon mirin  
o 1/4 cup chicken  
o 1/4 cup shrimp  
o 1/4 cup mushrooms  
• Instructions : 
o Beat eggs with dashi broth, soy sauce, and mirin.  
o Place chicken, shrimp, and mushrooms in small bowls.  
o Pour egg mixture over the top.  
o Steam for 15 minutes until set.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Chiles Rellenos  
• Ingredients : 
o 4 po blano peppers  
o 1 cup shredded cheese  
o 1/2 cup flour  
o 4 eggs  
o 1 cup vegetable oil  
o 1 cup tomato sauce  
• Instructions : 
o Roast peppers until charred, then peel and remove seeds.  
o Stuff peppers with cheese.  
o Separate eggs and beat whites until stiff, then fold in yolks.  
o Dredge peppers in flour, then dip in egg mixture.  
o Fry in hot oil until golden.  
o Serve with warmed tomato sauce.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup water
o 1/2 cup butter
o 1 cup flour
o 3 eggs
o 1/4 cup sugar
o 1 teaspoon cinnamon
o Oil for frying

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Bring water and butter to a boil.
o Add flour and stir until a dough forms.
o Remove from heat and beat in eggs one at a time.
o Heat oil in a pan.
o Pipe dough into hot oil and fry until golden.
o Drain on paper towels and roll in a mixture of sugar and cinnamon.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup rice
o 1 cup coconut milk
o 1 cup water
o 1/4 cup shredded coconut
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté shredded coconut until lightly browned.
o Add rice, coconut milk, water, and salt.
o Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until rice is tender.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 small cabbage
o 2 carrots
o 1/2 cup mayonnaise
o 2 tables poons apple cider vinegar
o 1 tablespoon sugar
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Shred cabbage and grate carrots.
o Mix mayonnaise, vinegar, sugar, and salt in a bowl.
o Toss cabbage and carrots with dressing.
o Chill for at least 1 hour before serving.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup cornmeal
o 1 cup flour
o 1/4 cup sugar
o 1 tablespoon baking powder
o 1/2 teaspoon salt
o 1 cup milk
o 1/4 cup vegetable oil
o 1 egg

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
o Mix cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
o Add milk, oil, and beaten egg, stir until combined.
o Pour batter into a greased baking pan.
o Bake for 20 -25 minutes until golden.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups shredded chicken
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup parsley
o 1/4 cup cream cheese
o 1 cup flour
o 1 cup breadcrumbs
o 2 eggs
o Oil for frying

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic until softened.
o Mix shredded chicken with onion, garlic, chopped parsley, and cream cheese.
o Form mixture into drumstick shapes.
o Dredge in flour, dip in beaten eggs, an d coat with breadcrumbs.
o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 8 slices bread
o 4 slices ham
o 1 cup grated Gruyère cheese
o 1/4 cup béchamel sauce

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
o Spread béchamel sauce on 4 slices of bread.
o Top with ham and grated cheese, then cover with remaining bread slices.
o Melt butter in a pan and toast sandwiches until golden.
o Transfer to a baking sheet, top with more béchamel sauce and cheese.
o Bake for 10 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1/2 cup butter
o 1/2 cup flour
o 2 cups milk
o 1/2 cup ham
o 1/4 cup grated cheese
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg
o 1 cup breadcrumbs
o 2 eggs
o Oil for frying

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Melt butter in a saucepan, stir in flour to make a roux.
o Gradually add milk, stirring constantly until thickened.
o Stir in diced ham, grated cheese, salt, and nutmeg.
o Let mixture cool, then form into croquettes.
o Dredge croquettes in flour, dip in beaten egg s, and coat with breadcrumbs.
o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup lentils
o 4 cups water
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1 teaspoon cumin
o 1 teaspoon turmeric
o 1 teaspoon coriander
o 1 teaspoon garam masala
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 2 tablespoons oil

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 6 eggs
o 1/4 cup mayonnaise
o 1 tablespoon mustard
o 1 tablespoon vinegar
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon paprika

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Hard -boil eggs, then peel and halve.
o Remove yolks and mash with mayonnaise, mustard, vinegar, and salt.
o Spoon or pipe yolk mixture into egg whites.
o Sprinkle with paprika and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 jar grape leaves
o 1 cup rice
o 1 small onion
o 1/4 cup pi ne nuts
o 1/4 cup currants
o 1/4 cup lemon juice
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Rinse grape leaves and pat dry.
o Sauté diced onion in olive oil until translucent.
o Add rice, pine nuts, and currants, cook for 5 minutes.
o Add 1 cup water, lemon juice, and salt, simmer until rice is tender.
o Place a spoonful of rice mixture on each grape leaf and roll tightly.
o Arrange dolmas in a pot, cover with water, and simmer for 30 minutes.
o Serve warm or chilled.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 package dumpling wrap pers
o 1/2 pound ground pork

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix ground pork, cabbage, green onions, minced garlic, soy sauce, and sesame
oil in a bowl.
o Place a spoonful of filling on each wrapper and fold to seal.
o Fry in hot oil until golden, then steam for 5 minutes.
o Serve with dipping sauce.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound edamame (soybeans in pods)
o 1 tablespoon sea salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Steam or boil edamame until tender (about 5 minutes).
o Drain and sprinkle with sea salt.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup ground egusi seeds
o 1/2 pound beef
o 1/2 pound fish
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 4 tomatoes
o 1/4 cup palm oil
o 1 teaspoon crayfish powder
o 1 tea spoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper
o 4 cups water
o 1/4 cup spinach

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in palm oil until softened.
o Add diced tomatoes, ground egusi seeds, and crayfish powder, cook for 5
minutes.
o Add beef, fish, salt, pepper, and water, simmer until meat is tender.
o Stir in chopped spinach and cook for 5 minutes.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 package egg roll wrappers
o 1 cup shredded cabbage
o 1/2 cup grated carrots
o 1/2 cup bean sprouts
o 1/4 cup chopped green onions
o 2 tablespoon s soy sauce
o 1 tablespoon sesame oil
o Oil for frying

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix cabbage, carrots, bean sprouts, green onions, soy sauce, and sesame oil in a
bowl.
o Place a spoonful of filling on each wrapper and roll tightly.
o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Drain on paper towels and serve with dipping sauce.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 ears of corn
o 1/4 cup mayonnaise
o 1/4 cup sour cream
o 1/2 cup cotija cheese
o 1 teaspoon chili powder
o 1 lime

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Grill the corn until charred.
o Mix mayonnaise and sour cream in a bowl.
o Brush the mixture onto the corn.
o Sprinkle with cotija cheese and chili powder.
o Squeeze lime juice over the top and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups flour
o 1/2 cup butter
o 1/4 cup water
o 1 egg
o 1/2 pound ground beef
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup olives
o 1/4 cup raisins
o 1 teaspoon cumin

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix flour, butter, water, and beaten egg to form a dough, then let rest.
o Sauté ground beef, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped olives, and raisins with
cumin, paprika, and salt until cooked.
o Roll out dough and cut into circles.
o Place a spoonful of filling on each circle and fold to seal.
o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 eggplants
o 2 bell peppers
o 2 tomatoes
o 1 small onion
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
o Roast eggplants, bell peppers, tomatoes, and onion until tender.
o Peel and slice vegetables.
o Arrange on a plate and drizzle with olive oil.
o Sprinkle wit h salt and serve warm or at room temperature.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 can chickpeas
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup parsley
o 1 teaspoon cumin
o 1 teaspoon coriander
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/4 cup flour
o Oil for frying

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Drain and rinse chickpeas.
o Blend chickpeas, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped parsley, cumin, coriander,
and salt in a food processor.
o Add flour and mix until combined.
o Form mixture into balls and fry in hot oil until golden.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups cassava flour
o 1/4 cup butter
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup bacon
o 1/4 cup parsley
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté diced bacon, onion, and minced garlic in butter until crispy.
o Add cassava flour and cook, stirring constantly, until golden.
o Stir in chopped parsley and salt.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 pita breads
o 4 tomatoes
o 1 cucumber
o 1 small red onion
o 1/4 cup parsley
o 1/4 cup mint
o 1/4 cup lemon juice
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 teaspoon sumac
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Toast pita breads u ntil crispy, then break into pieces.
o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.
o Mix vegetables with chopped parsley and mint.
o Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, sumac, and salt, then pour over salad.
o Toss well and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup yellow split peas
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1/4 cup lemon juice
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Rinse split peas and cook in water until tender.
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened.
o Blend cooked peas with onion, garlic, l emon juice, and salt until smooth.
o Serve warm or chilled.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups cooked beans
o 1/4 cup bacon
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup cassava flour
o 1/4 cup parsley
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté diced bacon, onion, and minced  garlic until crispy.
o Add cooked beans and cassava flour, stir to combine.
o Stir in chopped parsley and salt.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups flour
o 1/4 cup cornmeal
o 1/4 cup sugar
o 1 tablespoon baking powder
o 1/2 teaspoon salt
o 1/4 cup milk
o Oil for fr ying

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
o Add milk and stir until dough forms.
o Roll out dough and cut into strips.
o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast
o 1 teaspoon sugar
o 1 cup warm water
o 2 1/2 cups flour
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy.
o Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixtur e and olive oil.
o Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled.
o Press dough into a baking pan, dimple with fingers, and sprinkle with rosemary
and sea salt.
o Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 20 -25 minutes until golden.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup freekeh
o 2 cups water
o 1 small onion
o 1/4 cup parsley
o 1/4 cup mint
o 1/4 cup lemon juice
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Rinse freekeh and cook in water until tender, then drain.
o Sauté diced onion in olive oil until softened.
o Mix freekeh with sautéed oni on, chopped parsley, and mint.
o Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, and salt, then pour over salad.
o Toss well and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 ripe plantains
o 1 cup vegetable oil
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Peel and slice plantains.
o Heat oil in a pan and fry plantain slices until golden.
o Drain on paper towels and sprinkle with salt.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups cooked rice
o 1 small onion
o 1/2 cup peas

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté diced onion, peas, and carrots in sesame oil until softened.
o Push vegetables to the side and scramble eggs in the same pan.
o Add cooked rice and soy sauce, stir to combine.
o Cook until heated through.
o Garnish with chopped  green onions and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups cassava flour
o 4 cups water

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Bring water to a boil.
o Gradually add cassava flour, stirring constantly until thickened.
o Continue to cook, stirring, until smooth and elastic.
o Serve warm.

sections.content:
o 4 potatoes
o 1/4 cup soy sauce
o 2 tablespoons sugar
o 1 tablespoon sesame oil
o 1/4 cup water
o 1 tablespoon sesame seeds

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Peel and dice potatoes.
o Sauté potatoes in sesame oil until lightly browned.
o Add soy sauce, sugar, and water, simmer until potatoes are tender.
o Garnish with sesame seeds and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :

o 1/2 cup butter
o 4 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup parsley
o 1 teaspoon salt

o 4 tomatoes

o 1 small red onion
o 1 bell pepper
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Dice tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and bell pepper.
o Blend vegetables with minced garlic, olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper until
smooth.
o Chill for at least 1 hour before serving .

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups giant beans
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 4 tomatoes
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 teaspoon oregano
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Soak beans overnight, then cook until tender.
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened.
o Add diced tomatoes, oregano, salt, and pepper, simmer for 10 minutes.
o Mix beans with tomato sauce and transfer to a baking dish.
o Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30 minutes.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Cook shrimp and slice in half.
o Cook rice vermicelli according to package instructions, then drain.
o Soak rice paper wrappers in warm water until pliable.
o Place a small amount of shrimp, vermicelli, lettuce, mint, cilantro, basil, julienned
carrots, and cucumber on each wrapper.
o Roll tightly and serve with dipping sauce.
Gomae ( Spinach with Sesame Dressing)

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 bunch spinach
o 2 tablespoons sesame seeds
o 1 tablespoon soy sauce
o 1 tablespoon sugar
o 1 tablespoon mirin

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Blanch spinach in boiling water, then rinse in cold water and squeeze out excess
moisture.
o Toast sesame seeds and grind them.
o Mix sesame seeds with soy sauce, sugar, and mirin.
o Toss spinach with dressing and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 potatoes
o 1 cup heavy cream
o 1/2 cup milk
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/2 cup grated Gruyère cheese
o 1 teaspoon s alt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
o Peel and thinly slice potatoes.
o Rub a baking dish with a cut clove of garlic.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 tomatoes
o 1 cucumber
o 1 small red onion
o 1/4 cup olives
o 1/4 cup feta cheese
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar
o 1 teaspoon oregano
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.
o Mix vegetables with olives and crumbled feta cheese.
o Whisk olive oil, vinegar, oregano, and salt, then pour over salad.
o Toss well and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 cups green beans
o 1 can cream of mushroom soup
o 1/2 cup milk
o 1 cup fried onions
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
o Cook green beans until tender.
o Mix soup, milk, salt, and pepper in a baking dish.
o Add green beans and half of the fried onions, stir to combine.
o Bake for 25 minutes.
o Top with remaining fried onions and bake for an additional 5 minutes.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 3 avocados
o 1 lime

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Cut avocados in half, remove the pit, and scoop out the flesh into a bowl.
o Mash the avocados with a fork.
o Add lime juice, diced onion, chopped tomatoes, salt, cilantro, and garlic.
o Mix well  and serve immediately.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cucumbers
o 1/4 cup sour cream
o 2 tablespoons vinegar
o 1 tablespoon sugar
o 1 teaspoon dill
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Slice cucumbers thinly.
o Mix sour cream, vinegar, sugar, dill, and salt in a bowl.
o Toss cucumbers with the dressing.
o Serve chilled.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 eggs
o 1 cup water
o 1/4 cup green onions
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon sesame oil

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Beat eggs with water, salt, and chopped green onions.
o Pour mixture into a he atproof bowl.
o Steam for 10 -15 minutes until set.
o Drizzle with sesame oil and serve warm.

extracted_text.1:
Churros  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 cup water  
o 1/2 cup butter  
o 1 cup flour  
o 3 eggs  
o 1/4 cup sugar  
o 1 teaspoon cinnamon  
o Oil for frying  
• Instructions : 
o Bring water and butter to a boil.  
o Add flour and stir until a dough forms.  
o Remove from heat and beat in eggs one at a time.  
o Heat oil in a pan.  
o Pipe dough into hot oil and fry until golden.  
o Drain on paper towels and roll in a mixture of sugar and cinnamon.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Coconut Rice  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 cup rice  
o 1 cup coconut milk  
o 1 cup water  
o 1/4 cup shredded coconut  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
• Instructions : 
o Sauté shredded coconut until lightly browned.  
o Add rice, coconut milk, water, and salt.  
o Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until rice is tender.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Coleslaw  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 small cabbage  
o 2 carrots  
o 1/2 cup mayonnaise  
o 2 tables poons apple cider vinegar  
o 1 tablespoon sugar  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
• Instructions : 
o Shred cabbage and grate carrots.  
o Mix mayonnaise, vinegar, sugar, and salt in a bowl.  
o Toss cabbage and carrots with dressing.  
o Chill for at least 1 hour before serving.
extracted_text.2:
Cornbread  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 cup cornmeal  
o 1 cup flour  
o 1/4 cup sugar  
o 1 tablespoon baking powder  
o 1/2 teaspoon salt  
o 1 cup milk  
o 1/4 cup vegetable oil  
o 1 egg  
• Instructions : 
o Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).  
o Mix cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.  
o Add milk, oil, and beaten egg, stir until combined.  
o Pour batter into a greased baking pan.  
o Bake for 20 -25 minutes until golden.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Coxinha  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 cups shredded chicken  
o 1 small onion  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1/4 cup parsley  
o 1/4 cup cream cheese  
o 1 cup flour  
o 1 cup breadcrumbs  
o 2 eggs  
o Oil for frying  
• Instructions : 
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic until softened.  
o Mix shredded chicken with onion, garlic, chopped parsley, and cream cheese.  
o Form mixture into drumstick shapes.  
o Dredge in flour, dip in beaten eggs, an d coat with breadcrumbs.  
o Fry in hot oil until golden.  
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.  
 
Croque Monsieur  
• Ingredients : 
o 8 slices bread  
o 4 slices ham  
o 1 cup grated Gruyère cheese  
o 1/4 cup béchamel sauce
extracted_text.3:
o 2 tablespoons butter  
• Instructions : 
o Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).  
o Spread béchamel sauce on 4 slices of bread.  
o Top with ham and grated cheese, then cover with remaining bread slices.  
o Melt butter in a pan and toast sandwiches until golden.  
o Transfer to a baking sheet, top with more béchamel sauce and cheese.  
o Bake for 10 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Croquetas  
• Ingredients : 
o 1/2 cup butter  
o 1/2 cup flour  
o 2 cups milk  
o 1/2 cup ham  
o 1/4 cup grated cheese  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg  
o 1 cup breadcrumbs  
o 2 eggs  
o Oil for frying  
• Instructions : 
o Melt butter in a saucepan, stir in flour to make a roux.  
o Gradually add milk, stirring constantly until thickened.  
o Stir in diced ham, grated cheese, salt, and nutmeg.  
o Let mixture cool, then form into croquettes.  
o Dredge croquettes in flour, dip in beaten egg s, and coat with breadcrumbs.  
o Fry in hot oil until golden.  
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

• Ingredients :

o 1 teaspoon garam masala  
o 1 teaspoon salt

• Instructions :
extracted_text.4:
o Rinse lentils and cook in water until tender.  
o Heat oil in a pan and sauté diced onion and minced garlic until translucent.

o Add cooke d lentils and stir to combine.  
o Simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.  
o Add salt to taste and serve.

• Ingredients :

o 1/4 cup mayonnaise

o 1 tablespoon vinegar  
o 1 teaspoon salt

• Instructions :

o Remove yolks and mash with mayonnaise, mustard, vinegar, and salt.  
o Spoon or pipe yolk mixture into egg whites.  
o Sprinkle with paprika and serve.  
 
Dolmas  
• Ingredients :

o 1 cup rice  
o 1 small onion  
o 1/4 cup pi ne nuts  
o 1/4 cup currants  
o 1/4 cup lemon juice  
o 1/4 cup olive oil  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
• Instructions : 
o Rinse grape leaves and pat dry.  
o Sauté diced onion in olive oil until translucent.  
o Add rice, pine nuts, and currants, cook for 5 minutes.  
o Add 1 cup water, lemon juice, and salt, simmer until rice is tender.  
o Place a spoonful of rice mixture on each grape leaf and roll tightly.  
o Arrange dolmas in a pot, cover with water, and simmer for 30 minutes.  
o Serve warm or chilled.

• Instructions : 
o Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).  
o Cook green beans until tender.  
o Mix soup, milk, salt, and pepper in a baking dish.  
o Add green beans and half of the fried onions, stir to combine.  
o Bake for 25 minutes.  
o Top with remaining fried onions and bake for an additional 5 minutes.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Guacamole  
• Ingredients : 
o 3 avocados  
o 1 lime
extracted_text.15:
o 1 small onion  
o 2 tomatoes  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1 tablespoon chopped cilantro  
o 1 teaspoon minced garlic  
• Instructions : 
o Cut avocados in half, remove the pit, and scoop out the flesh into a bowl.  
o Mash the avocados with a fork.  
o Add lime juice, diced onion, chopped tomatoes, salt, cilantro, and garlic.  
o Mix well  and serve immediately.  
 
Gurkensalat (Cucumber Salad)  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 cucumbers  
o 1/4 cup sour cream  
o 2 tablespoons vinegar  
o 1 tablespoon sugar  
o 1 teaspoon dill  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
• Instructions : 
o Slice cucumbers thinly.  
o Mix sour cream, vinegar, sugar, dill, and salt in a bowl.  
o Toss cucumbers with the dressing.  
o Serve chilled.  
 
Gyeran Jjim  
• Ingredients : 
o 4 eggs  
o 1 cup water  
o 1/4 cup green onions  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/2 teaspoon sesame oil  
• Instructions : 
o Beat eggs with water, salt, and chopped green onions.  
o Pour mixture into a he atproof bowl.  
o Steam for 10 -15 minutes until set.  
o Drizzle with sesame oil and serve warm.  
 
Harira  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 cup lentils  
o 1/2 cup chickpeas  
o 1 small onion

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic until softened.
o Add diced tomatoes, lentils, chickpeas, vegetable broth, cumin, coriander,
turmeric, and salt.
o Simmer for 30 minutes until lentils are tender.
o Stir in chopped cilantro and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound dandelion greens
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1/4 cup lemon juice
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Boil dandelion greens until tender, then drain.
o Toss greens with olive oil, lemon juice, and salt.
o Serve warm or chilled.
Hot and Sour Soup

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 cups chicken broth
o 1/2 cup sliced mushrooms
o 1/4 cup bamboo shoots
o 1/4 cup tofu
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce
o 2 tablespoons rice vinegar
o 1 tablespoon cornstarch
o 1 teaspoon chili paste
o 1 egg
o 1/4 cup chopped green onions

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Bring chicken broth to a boil.
o Add mushrooms, bamboo shoots, tofu, soy sauce, rice vinegar, and chili paste.
o Mix cornstarch wit h water and add to the soup, stirring until thickened.
o Beat egg and slowly pour into the soup, stirring constantly.
o Garnish with chopped green onions and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 can chickpeas
o 1/4 cup tahini
o 1/4 cup lemon juice
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup  olive oil
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Drain and rinse chickpeas.
o Blend chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor.
o Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth.
o Serve with a drizzle of olive oil.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 8 ounces sweet potato noodles
o 1/2 pound beef
o 1 small onion
o 1 carrot
o 1 bell pepper
o 1 cup spinach
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce
o 1 tablespoon sesame oil
o 1 tablespoon sugar
o 1 tablespoon sesame seeds

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Cook noodles according to package instructions, then drain.
o Sauté sliced beef, diced onion, julienned carrot, and bell pepper in sesame oil
until cooked.
o Add spinach and cook until wilted.
o Mix noodles with soy sauce, sugar, and sesame seeds.
o Combine with cooked beef and vegetables.
o Serve warm.
Jerk Veg etables

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup broccoli
o 1 cup bell peppers
o 1 cup zucchini
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 2 tablespoons jerk seasoning

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Toss vegetables with minced garlic, jerk seasoning, and olive oil.
o Roast at 400°F (200°C) until  tender.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups flour
o 1/4 cup sugar
o 1 tablespoon baking powder
o 1/2 teaspoon salt
o 1/4 cup butter
o 1/2 cup milk
o Oil for frying

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
o Cut in cold butter until m ixture resembles coarse crumbs.
o Add milk and stir until dough forms.
o Roll out dough and cut into circles.
o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups rice
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 4 tomatoes
o 1/4 cup tomato paste
o 1/4 cup vegetable oil
o 1 teaspoon thyme
o 1 teaspoon curry powder
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper
o 4 cups chicken broth

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in vegetable oil until softened.
o Add diced tomatoes, tomato paste, th yme, curry powder, salt, and pepper, cook
for 5 minutes.
o Stir in rice and cook for 2 minutes.
o Add chicken broth and bring to a boil.
o Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until rice is tender.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 tomatoes
o 1 small onion
o 1 cucumber
o 1/4 cup cilantro
o 1/4 cup lemon juice
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Dice tomatoes, onion, and cucumber.
o Mix vegetables with chopped cilantro, lemon juice, and salt.
o Serve chilled.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups flour
o 1/2 cup milk
o 3 eggs
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg
o 1/4 cup butter
o 1 cup grated cheese
o 1 small onion

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix flour, milk, beaten eggs, salt, and nutmeg to form a batter.
o Press batter through a spaetzle maker or colander into boiling water.
o Cook until spaetzle floats to the surface, then drain.
o Sauté sliced onion in butter until golden.
o Layer spaetzle and grated cheese in a baking dish, top with sautéed onion.
o Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 15 minutes until cheese is melted.
o Serve warm.
Kartoffelsalat (Pota to Salad)

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 potatoes
o 1 small onion
o 1/4 cup bacon
o 1/4 cup vinegar
o 1/4 cup chicken broth
o 1 tablespoon mustard
o 1 teaspoon sugar
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Boil potatoes until tender, then dice.
o Cook diced bacon until crispy, then remove and set aside.
o Sauté diced onion in bacon fat until softened.
o Mix vinegar, chicken broth, mustard, sugar, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
o Combine potatoes, bacon, and onion with the dressing.
o Serve warm or chilled.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1/2 pound ground beef
o 1/2 pound ground pork
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs
o 1 egg
o 1 teaspoon oregano
o 1 teaspoon mint
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper
o Oil for frying

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix ground beef, ground pork, diced onion, minced garlic, breadcrumbs, beaten
egg, oregano, mint, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
o Form mixture into meatballs.
o Heat oil in a pan and fry meatballs until golden.
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup bulgur
o 1/2 pound ground beef
o 1 small onion
o 1/4 cup pine nuts
o 1 teaspoon cumin
o 1 teaspoon allspice
o 1 teaspoon salt
o Oil for frying

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Soak bulgur in water until tender, then drain.
o Mix bulgur with ground beef, diced onion, pine nuts, cumin, allspice, and salt.
o Form mixture into balls or patties.
o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Drain on paper towels and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 napa cabbage
o 1/4 cup sea salt
o 1 tablespoon sugar
o 2 tablespoons fish sauce
o 2 tablespoons gochugaru (Korean chili powder)
o 4 cloves garlic
o 1 inch ginger
o 4 green onio ns

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Cut cabbage into quarters and soak in salted water for 2 hours.
o Rinse and drain cabbage.
o Mix sugar, fish sauce, gochugaru, minced garlic, grated ginger, and chopped
green onions in a bowl.
o Rub mixture onto cabbage leaves.
o Pack cabbage into  a jar and let ferment at room temperature for 2 -3 days.
o Store in the refrigerator and serve as needed.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound soybean sprouts
o 2 cloves garlic
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce
o 1 tablespoon sesame oil
o 1 tablespoon sesame seeds

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Blanch soybean sprouts in boiling water for 2 minutes, then drain.
o Mix minced garlic, soy sauce, sesame oil, and sesame seeds in a bowl.
o Toss sprouts with the dressing.
o Serve chilled.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups yogurt
o 1/2 teaspoon salt
o 1/4 c up olive oil

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix yogurt with salt.
o Place yogurt in a cheesecloth -lined strainer over a bowl.
o Let drain in the refrigerator for 24 hours.
o Transfer labneh to a serving dish and drizzle with olive oil.
o Serve with pita bread.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1/2 pound ground chicken
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 2 tablespoons fish sauce
o 2 tablespoons lime juice
o 1 tablespoon sugar
o 1 tablespoon rice powder
o 1/4 cup mint
o 1/4 cup cilantro
o 1-2 Thai chilies

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté ground chicken, diced onion, and minced garlic until cooked.
o Mix fish sauce, lime juice, sugar, and rice powder in a bowl.
o Toss chicken with the dressing, chopped mint, cilantro, and sliced chilies.
o Serve with lettuce leaves.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 8 ounces lo mein noodles
o 1 cup sliced bell peppers
o 1 cup snow peas
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce
o 1 tablespoon oyster sauce
o 1 tablespoon sesame oil

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Cook lo mein noodles according to package instructions, then drain.
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in sesame oil until fragrant.
o Add bell peppers and snow peas, stir -fry until tender.
o Add cooked noodles, soy sauce, and oyster sauce, stir to combine.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups white beans
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 4 tomatoes
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 teaspoon cumin

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Soak beans overnight, then cook until tender.
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened.
o Add diced tomatoes, cumin, paprika, and salt, simmer for 10 minu tes.
o Mix beans with tomato sauce and cook for 10 minutes.
o Stir in chopped cilantro and serve warm.
Macaroni and Cheese

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups elbow macaroni
o 2 cups milk
o 2 tablespoons butter
o 2 tablespoons flour
o 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Cook macaroni according to package instructions, then drain.
o Melt butter in a saucepan, stir in flour to make a roux.
o Gradually add milk, stirring constantly until thickened.
o Add cheese, salt, and pepper, stir until melted .
o Combine cheese sauce with macaroni.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast
o 1 teaspoon sugar
o 1 cup warm water
o 3 cups flour
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1/4 cup za'atar

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water,  let sit until foamy.
o Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture and olive oil.
o Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled.
o Divide dough into balls and roll out into circles.
o Spread za'atar mixed with olive oil on top.
o Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 10 -12 minutes until golden.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups flour
o 1/4 cup sugar
o 1 tablespoon baking powder
o 1/2 teaspoon salt
o 1/4 cup coconut milk
o 1/4 cup water
o Oil for frying

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
o Add coconut milk and water, stir until dough forms.
o Roll out dough and cut into triangles.
o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 package dumpling wrappers
o 1/2 pound ground pork
o 1/2 cup chopped cabbage
o 1/4 cup chopped green onions
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1 tablespoon soy sauce
o 1 teaspoon sesame oil
o Oil for frying

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix ground pork, cabbage, green onions, minced garlic, soy sauce, and sesame
o Place a spoonful of filling on each wrapper and fold to seal.
o Fry in hot oil until golden, then steam for 5 minutes.
o Serve with dipping sauce.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup glutinous rice
o 1 cup coconut milk
o 1/4 cup sugar
o 1/4 teaspoon salt
o 2 mangoes

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Rinse rice and soak in water for 1 hour.
o Steam rice until tender.
o Heat coconut milk with sugar and salt until dissolved.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 block tofu
o 1/2 pound ground pork
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1 tablespoon chili bean paste
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce
o 1 tablespoon rice wine
o 1 teaspoon sugar
o 1/4 cup chicken broth
o 1 tablespoon cornstarch
o 1/4 cup chopped green onions

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Cut tofu into cubes and set aside.
o Sauté ground pork, diced onion, and minced garlic until browned.
o Add chili bean paste, soy sauce, rice wine, and sugar, cook for 2 minutes.
o Add chicken broth and tofu, simmer for 5 minutes.
o Mix cornstarch with water and add to the pan, stirring until thickened.
o Garnish with chopped green oni ons and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 potatoes
o 1/2 cup milk
o 1/4 cup butter
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Peel and dice potatoes.
o Boil potatoes until tender, then drain.
o Mash potatoes with milk, butter, salt, and pepper.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 onion
o 2 carrots
o 2 celery stalks
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1 zucchini

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté diced onion, carrots, celer y, and minced garlic until softened.
o Add diced zucchini, tomatoes, and broth.
o Bring to a boil, then simmer for 20 minutes.
o Add beans and pasta, cook until pasta is tender.
o Stir in chopped basil and serve with grated Parmesan cheese.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 cups dashi broth
o 1/4 cup miso paste
o 1/2 cup tofu
o 1/4 cup green onions
o 1/4 cup seaweed

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Heat dashi broth until warm.
o Dissolve miso paste in a small amount of broth, then add to the pot.
o Add diced tofu and seaweed.
o Simmer for 5 minutes.
o Garni sh with sliced green onions and serve.
Moqueca de Banana

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 bananas
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1 bell pepper
o 2 tomatoes
o 1 cup coconut milk
o 1/4 cup cilantro
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté diced onion, minced garlic, and sliced bell pepper until softened.
o Add diced tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes.
o Stir in coconut milk, sliced bananas, salt, and pepper.
o Simmer for 10 minutes.
o Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups flour
o 1 cup semolina
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 cup water
o 1/4 cup butter

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix flour, semolina, and salt in a bowl.
o Add water and knead until smooth.
o Divide dough into balls and roll out into thin circles.
o Brush with melted butter and fold into squares.
o Cook on a hot griddle until golden on both sides.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 red bell peppers
o 1/2 cup walnuts
o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 tablespoon pomegranate molasses
o 1 teaspoon cumin
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Roast bell peppers until charred, then peel and seed.
o Blend peppers, walnuts, breadcrumbs, minced garlic, olive oil, pomegranate
molasses, cumin, and salt in a food processor until smooth.
o Serve with pita bread.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 eggplants
o 1/4 cup tahini
o 1/4 cup lemon juice
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content: o Roast eggplants until soft, then peel and mash.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast
o 1 teaspoon sugar
o 1/2 cup warm water
o 2 1/2 cups flour
o 1/2 cup yogurt
o 1/4 cup melted butter
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Dissolve yeast and sugar in  warm water, let sit until foamy.
o Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture, yogurt, and melted butter.
o Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled.
o Divide dough into balls and roll out into circles.
o Cook on a hot griddle until bubbles form,  then flip and cook the other side.
o Brush with melted butter and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 green papaya
o 2 carrots
o 1/4 cup peanuts
o 1/4 cup cilantro
o 2 tablespoons fish sauce
o 2 tablespoons lime juice
o 1 tablespoon sugar
o 1-2 Tha i chilies

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Peel and shred green papaya and carrots.
o Crush peanuts and chop cilantro.
o Mix fish sauce, lime juice, sugar, and sliced chilies in a bowl.
o Toss shredded papaya, carrots, peanuts, and cilantro with the dressing.
o Serve chilled.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1/4 cup fish sauce
o 1/4 cup lime juice
o 2 tablespoons sugar

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix fish sauce, lime juice, sugar, minced garlic, and sliced chilies in a bowl.
o Add water and stir until sugar is disso lved.
o Serve as a dipping sauce.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cucumbers
o 2 cloves garlic
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce
o 1 tablespoon sesame oil
o 1 tablespoon gochugaru (Korean chili powder)
o 1 tablespoon sesame seeds

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Slice cucumbers thinly.
o Mix minced garlic, soy sauce, sesame oil, gochugaru, and sesame seeds in a bowl.
o Toss cucumbers with the dressing.
o Serve chilled.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups cooked sushi rice
o 1/4 cup filling (salmon, pickled plum)
o 1 sheet nori (seaweed)

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Wet hands and shape rice into balls or triangles.
o Make a small indentation and add filling.
o Wrap with a strip of nori.
o Serve immediately.
Pão de Queijo

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups tapioca flour
o 1 cup milk
o 1/2 cup butter
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
o 2 eggs

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
o Heat milk, butter, and salt in a saucepan until boiling.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 8 ounces wide rice noodles
o 1/2 pound chicken breast
o 1 cup broccoli
o 2 eggs
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce
o 2 tablespoons oyster sauce
o 1 tablespoon sugar
o 1 tablespoon vegetable oil

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Soak rice noodles in warm water until softened, then drain.
o Sauté sliced chicken in vegetable oil until cooked, then set aside.
o Scramble eggs in the same pan.
o Add noodles, soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sugar, stir t o combine.
o Add broccoli and cooked chicken, stir -fry until heated through.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 8 ounces rice noodles
o 1/2 pound shrimp
o 2 eggs
o 1 cup bean sprouts
o 1/4 cup peanuts
o 2 tablespoons fish sauce
o 2 tablespoons tamarind paste
o 1 tablespoon sugar
o 1 tablespoon lime juice
o 1/4 cup green onions

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Soak rice noodles in warm water until softened, then drain.
o Sauté shrimp in a pan until cooked, then set aside.
