o Press batter through a spaetzle maker or colander into boiling water.  
o Cook until spaetzle floats to the surface, then drain.  
o Sauté sliced onion in butter until golden.  
o Layer spaetzle and grated cheese in a baking dish, top with sautéed onion.  
o Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 15 minutes until cheese is melted.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Kartoffelsalat (Pota to Salad)  
• Ingredients : 
o 4 potatoes  
o 1 small onion  
o 1/4 cup bacon  
o 1/4 cup vinegar  
o 1/4 cup chicken broth  
o 1 tablespoon mustard  
o 1 teaspoon sugar  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper
extracted_text.5:
• Instructions : 
o Boil potatoes until tender, then dice.  
o Cook diced bacon until crispy, then remove and set aside.  
o Sauté diced onion in bacon fat until softened.  
o Mix vinegar, chicken broth, mustard, sugar, salt, and pepper in a bowl.  
o Combine potatoes, bacon, and onion with the dressing.  
o Serve warm or chilled.  
 
Keftedes  
• Ingredients : 
o 1/2 pound ground beef  
o 1/2 pound ground pork  
o 1 small onion  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs  
o 1 egg  
o 1 teaspoon oregano  
o 1 teaspoon mint  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper  
o Oil for frying  
• Instructions : 
o Mix ground beef, ground pork, diced onion, minced garlic, breadcrumbs, beaten 
egg, oregano, mint, salt, and pepper in a bowl.  
o Form mixture into meatballs.  
o Heat oil in a pan and fry meatballs until golden.  
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.  
 
Kibbeh  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 cup bulgur  
o 1/2 pound ground beef  
o 1 small onion  
o 1/4 cup pine nuts  
o 1 teaspoon cumin  
o 1 teaspoon allspice  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o Oil for frying  
• Instructions : 
o Soak bulgur in water until tender, then drain.  
o Mix bulgur with ground beef, diced onion, pine nuts, cumin, allspice, and salt.  
o Form mixture into balls or patties.  
o Fry in hot oil until golden.  
o Drain on paper towels and serve.
extracted_text.6:
Kimchi  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 napa cabbage  
o 1/4 cup sea salt  
o 1 tablespoon sugar  
o 2 tablespoons fish sauce  
o 2 tablespoons gochugaru (Korean chili powder)  
o 4 cloves garlic  
o 1 inch ginger  
o 4 green onio ns 
• Instructions : 
o Cut cabbage into quarters and soak in salted water for 2 hours.  
o Rinse and drain cabbage.  
o Mix sugar, fish sauce, gochugaru, minced garlic, grated ginger, and chopped 
green onions in a bowl.  
o Rub mixture onto cabbage leaves.  
o Pack cabbage into  a jar and let ferment at room temperature for 2 -3 days.  
o Store in the refrigerator and serve as needed.  
 
Kongnamul Muchim  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 pound soybean sprouts  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce  
o 1 tablespoon sesame oil  
o 1 tablespoon sesame seeds  
• Instructions : 
o Blanch soybean sprouts in boiling water for 2 minutes, then drain.  
o Mix minced garlic, soy sauce, sesame oil, and sesame seeds in a bowl.  
o Toss sprouts with the dressing.  
o Serve chilled.  
 
Labneh  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 cups yogurt  
o 1/2 teaspoon salt  
o 1/4 c up olive oil  
• Instructions : 
o Mix yogurt with salt.  
o Place yogurt in a cheesecloth -lined strainer over a bowl.  
o Let drain in the refrigerator for 24 hours.  
o Transfer labneh to a serving dish and drizzle with olive oil.  
o Serve with pita bread.
extracted_text.7:
Larb  
• Ingredients : 
o 1/2 pound ground chicken  
o 1 small onion  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 2 tablespoons fish sauce  
o 2 tablespoons lime juice  
o 1 tablespoon sugar  
o 1 tablespoon rice powder  
o 1/4 cup mint  
o 1/4 cup cilantro  
o 1-2 Thai chilies  
• Instructions : 
o Sauté ground chicken, diced onion, and minced garlic until cooked.  
o Mix fish sauce, lime juice, sugar, and rice powder in a bowl.  
o Toss chicken with the dressing, chopped mint, cilantro, and sliced chilies.  
o Serve with lettuce leaves.  
 
Lo Mein  
• Ingredients : 
o 8 ounces lo mein noodles  
o 1 cup sliced bell peppers  
o 1 cup snow peas  
o 1 small onion  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce  
o 1 tablespoon oyster sauce  
o 1 tablespoon sesame oil  
• Instructions : 
o Cook lo mein noodles according to package instructions, then drain.  
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in sesame oil until fragrant.  
o Add bell peppers and snow peas, stir -fry until tender.  
o Add cooked noodles, soy sauce, and oyster sauce, stir to combine.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Loubia  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 cups white beans  
o 1 small onion  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 4 tomatoes  
o 1/4 cup olive oil  
o 1 teaspoon cumin
extracted_text.8:
o 1 teaspoon paprika  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/4 cup cilantro  
• Instructions : 
o Soak beans overnight, then cook until tender.  
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened.  
o Add diced tomatoes, cumin, paprika, and salt, simmer for 10 minu tes. 
o Mix beans with tomato sauce and cook for 10 minutes.  
o Stir in chopped cilantro and serve warm.  
 
Macaroni and Cheese  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 cups elbow macaroni  
o 2 cups milk  
o 2 tablespoons butter  
o 2 tablespoons flour  
o 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper  
• Instructions : 
o Cook macaroni according to package instructions, then drain.  
o Melt butter in a saucepan, stir in flour to make a roux.  
o Gradually add milk, stirring constantly until thickened.  
o Add cheese, salt, and pepper, stir until melted . 
o Combine cheese sauce with macaroni.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Manakish  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast  
o 1 teaspoon sugar  
o 1 cup warm water  
o 3 cups flour  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/4 cup olive oil  
o 1/4 cup za'atar  
• Instructions : 
o Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water,  let sit until foamy.  
o Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture and olive oil.  
o Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled.  
o Divide dough into balls and roll out into circles.  
o Spread za'atar mixed with olive oil on top.  
o Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 10 -12 minutes until golden.  
o Serve warm.
extracted_text.9:
Mandazi  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 cups flour  
o 1/4 cup sugar  
o 1 tablespoon baking powder  
o 1/2 teaspoon salt  
o 1/4 cup coconut milk  
o 1/4 cup water  
o Oil for frying  
• Instructions : 
o Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.  
o Add coconut milk and water, stir until dough forms.  
o Roll out dough and cut into triangles.  
o Fry in hot oil until golden.  
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.  
 
Mandu  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 package dumpling wrappers  
o 1/2 pound ground pork  
o 1/2 cup chopped cabbage  
o 1/4 cup chopped green onions  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1 tablespoon soy sauce  
o 1 teaspoon sesame oil  
o Oil for frying  
• Instructions : 
o Mix ground pork, cabbage, green onions, minced garlic, soy sauce, and sesame  
o Place a spoonful of filling on each wrapper and fold to seal.  
o Fry in hot oil until golden, then steam for 5 minutes.  
o Serve with dipping sauce.  
 
Mango Sticky Rice  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 cup glutinous rice  
o 1 cup coconut milk  
o 1/4 cup sugar  
o 1/4 teaspoon salt  
o 2 mangoes  
• Instructions : 
o Rinse rice and soak in water for 1 hour.  
o Steam rice until tender.  
o Heat coconut milk with sugar and salt until dissolved.
extracted_text.10:
o Mix coconut milk with cooked rice and let sit for 10 minutes.  
o Serve rice with sliced mangoes.  
 
Mapo Tofu  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 block tofu  
o 1/2 pound ground pork  
o 1 small onion  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1 tablespoon chili bean paste  
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce  
o 1 tablespoon rice wine  
o 1 teaspoon sugar  
o 1/4 cup chicken broth  
o 1 tablespoon cornstarch  
o 1/4 cup chopped green onions  
• Instructions : 
o Cut tofu into cubes and set aside.  
o Sauté ground pork, diced onion, and minced garlic until browned.  
o Add chili bean paste, soy sauce, rice wine, and sugar, cook for 2 minutes.  
o Add chicken broth and tofu, simmer for 5 minutes.  
o Mix cornstarch with water and add to the pan, stirring until thickened.  
o Garnish with chopped green oni ons and serve.  
 
Mashed Potatoes  
• Ingredients : 
o 4 potatoes  
o 1/2 cup milk  
o 1/4 cup butter  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper  
• Instructions : 
o Peel and dice potatoes.  
o Boil potatoes until tender, then drain.  
o Mash potatoes with milk, butter, salt, and pepper.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Minestrone  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 onion  
o 2 carrots  
o 2 celery stalks  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1 zucchini
extracted_text.11:
o 1 can diced tomatoes  
o 4 cups vegetable broth  
o 1 can cannellini beans  
o 1 cup pasta  
o 1/4 cup basil  
o 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese  
• Instructions : 
o Sauté diced onion, carrots, celer y, and minced garlic until softened.  
o Add diced zucchini, tomatoes, and broth.  
o Bring to a boil, then simmer for 20 minutes.  
o Add beans and pasta, cook until pasta is tender.  
o Stir in chopped basil and serve with grated Parmesan cheese.  
 
Miso Soup  
• Ingredients : 
o 4 cups dashi broth  
o 1/4 cup miso paste  
o 1/2 cup tofu  
o 1/4 cup green onions  
o 1/4 cup seaweed  
• Instructions : 
o Heat dashi broth until warm.  
o Dissolve miso paste in a small amount of broth, then add to the pot.  
o Add diced tofu and seaweed.  
o Simmer for 5 minutes.  
o Garni sh with sliced green onions and serve.  
 
Moqueca de Banana  
• Ingredients : 
o 4 bananas  
o 1 small onion  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1 bell pepper  
o 2 tomatoes  
o 1 cup coconut milk  
o 1/4 cup cilantro  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper  
• Instructions : 
o Sauté diced onion, minced garlic, and sliced bell pepper until softened.  
o Add diced tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes.  
o Stir in coconut milk, sliced bananas, salt, and pepper.  
o Simmer for 10 minutes.  
o Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve warm.
extracted_text.12:
Msemen  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 cups flour  
o 1 cup semolina  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/4 cup olive oil  
o 1 cup water  
o 1/4 cup butter  
• Instructions : 
o Mix flour, semolina, and salt in a bowl.  
o Add water and knead until smooth.  
o Divide dough into balls and roll out into thin circles.  
o Brush with melted butter and fold into squares.  
o Cook on a hot griddle until golden on both sides.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Muhammara  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 red bell peppers  
o 1/2 cup walnuts  
o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1/4 cup olive oil  
o 1 tablespoon pomegranate molasses  
o 1 teaspoon cumin  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
• Instructions : 
o Roast bell peppers until charred, then peel and seed.  
o Blend peppers, walnuts, breadcrumbs, minced garlic, olive oil, pomegranate 
molasses, cumin, and salt in a food processor until smooth.  
o Serve with pita bread.  
 
Mutabal  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 eggplants  
o 1/4 cup tahini  
o 1/4 cup lemon juice  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1/4 cup olive oil  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
• Instructions : 
o Roast eggplants until soft, then peel and mash.
extracted_text.13:
o Blend mashed eggplant, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food 
processor.  
o Slowly add olive oil while b lending until smooth.  
o Serve with a drizzle of olive oil.  
 
Naan  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast  
o 1 teaspoon sugar  
o 1/2 cup warm water  
o 2 1/2 cups flour  
o 1/2 cup yogurt  
o 1/4 cup melted butter  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
• Instructions : 
o Dissolve yeast and sugar in  warm water, let sit until foamy.  
o Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture, yogurt, and melted butter.  
o Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled.  
o Divide dough into balls and roll out into circles.  
o Cook on a hot griddle until bubbles form,  then flip and cook the other side.  
o Brush with melted butter and serve warm.  
 
Nom Du Du (Green Papaya Salad)  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 green papaya  
o 2 carrots  
o 1/4 cup peanuts  
o 1/4 cup cilantro  
o 2 tablespoons fish sauce  
o 2 tablespoons lime juice  
o 1 tablespoon sugar  
o 1-2 Tha i chilies  
• Instructions : 
o Peel and shred green papaya and carrots.  
o Crush peanuts and chop cilantro.  
o Mix fish sauce, lime juice, sugar, and sliced chilies in a bowl.  
o Toss shredded papaya, carrots, peanuts, and cilantro with the dressing.  
o Serve chilled.  
 
Nuoc Cham  
• Ingredients : 
o 1/4 cup fish sauce  
o 1/4 cup lime juice  
o 2 tablespoons sugar
extracted_text.14:
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1-2 Thai chilies  
o 1/4 cup water  
• Instructions : 
o Mix fish sauce, lime juice, sugar, minced garlic, and sliced chilies in a bowl.  
o Add water and stir until sugar is disso lved.  
o Serve as a dipping sauce.  
 
Oi Muchim  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 cucumbers  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce  
o 1 tablespoon sesame oil  
o 1 tablespoon gochugaru (Korean chili powder)  
o 1 tablespoon sesame seeds  
• Instructions : 
o Slice cucumbers thinly.  
o Mix minced garlic, soy sauce, sesame oil, gochugaru, and sesame seeds in a bowl.  
o Toss cucumbers with the dressing.  
o Serve chilled.  
 
Onigiri (Rice Balls)  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 cups cooked sushi rice  
o 1/4 cup filling (salmon, pickled plum)  
o 1 sheet nori (seaweed)  
• Instructions : 
o Wet hands and shape rice into balls or triangles.  
o Make a small indentation and add filling.  
o Wrap with a strip of nori.  
o Serve immediately.  
 
Pão de Queijo  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 cups tapioca flour  
o 1 cup milk  
o 1/2 cup butter  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese  
o 2 eggs  
• Instructions : 
o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).  
o Heat milk, butter, and salt in a saucepan until boiling.
extracted_text.15:
o Remove from heat and stir in tapioca flour until smooth.  
o Let cool slightly, then mix in grated cheese and beaten eggs.  
o Form dough i nto balls and place on a baking sheet.  
o Bake for 20 -25 minutes until golden.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Pad See Ew  
• Ingredients : 
o 8 ounces wide rice noodles  
o 1/2 pound chicken breast  
o 1 cup broccoli  
o 2 eggs  
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce  
o 2 tablespoons oyster sauce  
o 1 tablespoon sugar  
o 1 tablespoon vegetable oil  
• Instructions : 
o Soak rice noodles in warm water until softened, then drain.  
o Sauté sliced chicken in vegetable oil until cooked, then set aside.  
o Scramble eggs in the same pan.  
o Add noodles, soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sugar, stir t o combine.  
o Add broccoli and cooked chicken, stir -fry until heated through.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Pad Thai  
• Ingredients : 
o 8 ounces rice noodles  
o 1/2 pound shrimp  
o 2 eggs  
o 1 cup bean sprouts  
o 1/4 cup peanuts  
o 2 tablespoons fish sauce  
o 2 tablespoons tamarind paste  
o 1 tablespoon sugar  
o 1 tablespoon lime juice  
o 1/4 cup green onions  
• Instructions : 
o Soak rice noodles in warm water until softened, then drain.  
o Sauté shrimp in a pan until cooked, then set aside.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup flour
o 1 cup water
o 1 egg
o 1/2 cup green onions
o 1/2 cup seafood (optional)
o 1 tablespoon soy sauce
o 1 tablespoon sesame oil

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix flour, water, and beaten egg in a bowl.
o Add chopped green onions and seafood (if using).
o Heat sesame oil in a pan and pour in  batter.
o Cook until golden on both sides.
o Serve with soy sauce for dipping.
Pan con Tomate

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 baguette
o 4 tomatoes
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Slice baguette and toast until golden.
o Rub toasted bread with cut  garlic cloves.
o Grate tomatoes and spread on bread.
o Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.
o Serve immediately.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound paneer
o 1/2 cup yogurt
o 1 tablespoon lemon juice
o 1 teaspoon cumin
o 1 teaspoon coriander
o 1 teaspoon garam m asala
o 1 teaspoon turmeric

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Cut paneer into cubes.
o Mix yogurt, lemon juice, cumin, coriander, garam masala, turmeric, and salt in a
bowl.
o Add paneer cubes and marinate for at least 1 hour.
o Thread paneer onto skewers.
o Grill or broil until golden, turning occasionally.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 cups cubed bread
o 4 tomatoes
o 1 cucumber
o 1 small red onion
o 1/4 cup basil
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Toast bread cubes until golden.
o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.
o Mix bread, tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and chopped basil.
o Whisk olive oil, vinegar, and salt, then pour over salad.
o Toss well and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup urad dal flour
o 1/4 cup wate r
o 1/2 teaspoon salt
o Oil for frying

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix urad dal flour, water, and salt to form a dough.
o Roll dough into thin circles.
o Fry in hot oil until crispy.
o Drain on paper towels and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 potatoes
o 1/4 cup olive oil

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Peel and dice potatoes.
o Toss potatoes with olive oil and salt, then roast at 400°F (200°C) until crispy.
o Mix tomato sauce, paprika, and cayen ne pepper in a bowl.
o Serve potatoes with tomato sauce and a dollop of mayonnaise.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound beef
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 4 cups beef broth
o 1 cup spinach
o 1 cup okra
o 1 teaspoon thyme
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté diced beef, onion, and minced garlic until browned.
o Add beef broth, thyme, salt, and pepper, simmer for 1 hour.
o Stir in spinach and okra, cook until tender.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound chicken thighs
o 1/4 cup peri -peri sauce
o 2 tablespoons olive oil
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Marinate chicken in peri -peri sauce, olive oil, salt, and pepper for at least 1 hour.
o Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
o Arrange chicken on a baking sheet and roast for 25 -30 minutes until cooked
through.
o Serve warm.
Pico de Gallo

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Dice tomatoes, onion, and jalapeño.
o Chop cilantro.
o Combine all ingredients in a bowl.
o Squeeze lime juice over the mixture and add salt.
o Mix well and serve.
Pimientos de Padrón

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound Padrón peppers
o 2 tablespoons olive oil
o 1 teaspoon sea salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Heat olive oil in a pan.
o Add Padrón peppers and sauté until blistered and tender.
o Sprinkle with sea salt and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 green plantains
o 1 cup vegetable oil
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Peel and slice plantains thinly.
o Heat oil in a pan and fry plantain slices until crispy.
o Drain on paper towels and sprinkle with salt.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup cornmeal
o 4 cups water
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 2 tablespoons butter
o 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Bring water and salt to a boil.
o Gradually whisk in cornmeal.
o Reduce heat and cook, stirring constantly, until thickened (about 30 minutes).

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 potatoes
o 2 eggs
o 1 small onion
o 1/2 cup mayonnaise
o 2 tablespoons mustard
o 1 tablespoon vinegar
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Boil potatoes until tender, then dice.
o Hard -boil eggs, then chop.
o Mix potatoes, eggs, diced onion, mayonnaise, mustard, vinegar, salt, and pepper.
o Chill for at least 1 hour before serving.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast
o 1 teaspoon sugar
o 1 cup warm water
o 3 cups flour
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/4 cup baking soda
o 1 egg
o Coarse salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy.
o Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture.
o Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled.
o Divide dough into pieces and roll into ropes, then shape into pretzels.
o Boil water with baking soda and dip pretzels in the solution.
o Place on a baking sheet, brush with beaten egg, and sprinkle with coarse salt.
o Bake a t 450°F (230°C) for 12 -15 minutes until golden.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup basmati rice
o 2 cups water
o 1 small onion

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Rinse rice and soak in water for 30 minutes.
o Heat oil in a pan and sauté diced onion until translucent.
o Add diced carrot, peas, cumin, coriander, turmeric, and garam masala, cook for 1
minute.
o Drain rice and add to the pan, sti r to coat with spices.
o Add water and bring to a boil.
o Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until rice is tender and water is absorbed.
o Add salt to taste and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 flour tortillas
o 2 cups shredded cheese
o 1/2 cup diced cooked chicken ( optional)
o 1/4 cup chopped cilantro
o 1 tablespoon vegetable oil

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Heat oil in a pan.
o Place a tortilla in the pan and sprinkle with cheese, chicken, and cilantro.
o Top with another tortilla.
o Cook until cheese is melted and tortilla is golden, then flip and cook the other
side.
o Cut into wedges and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pie crust
o 6 slices bacon
o 1 small onion
o 1 cup grated Gruyère cheese
o 3 eggs
o 1 cup heavy cream
o 1/2 teaspoon salt
o 1/4 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups sugar
o 1 cup coconut
o 1/4 cup butter
o 10 egg yolks
o 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
o Mix sugar, coconut, melted butter, egg yolks, and vanilla extract in a  bowl.
o Pour mixture into greased muffin tins.
o Bake for 30 -35 minutes until set and golden.
o Let cool before removing from tins.
o Serve chilled.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup yogurt
o 1/2 cucumber
o 1/4 cup mint
o 1/4 teaspoon cumin
o 1/4 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Grate cucumber and squeeze out excess moisture.
o Mix yogurt with cucumber, chopped mint, cumin, and salt.
o Serve chilled.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 eggplant
o 1 zucchini
o 1 bell pepper
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 4 tomatoes
o 1 teaspoon thyme

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Dice eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, and tomatoes.
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened.
o Add eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, tomatoes, thyme, rosemary, and salt.
o Simmer for 30  minutes, stirring occasionally.
o Serve warm.
Rau Muong Xao Toi (Stir -Fried Morning Glory with Garlic)

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound morning glory
o 4 cloves garlic
o 2 tablespoons fish sauce
o 1 tablespoon vegetable oil

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté minced garlic in vegetable oil  until fragrant.
o Add morning glory and stir -fry until tender.
o Add fish sauce and cook for 2 minutes.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups cooked pinto beans
o 1/4 cup lard or vegetable oil
o 1 small onion
o 1 clove garlic
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Heat lard or oil in a pan and sauté diced onion and minced garlic until
translucent.
o Add beans and mash with a potato masher.
o Cook, stirring frequently, until beans are thickened.
o Add salt to taste and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound chicken
o 1 small on ion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1 teaspoon cumin
o 1 teaspoon turmeric
o 1 teaspoon ginger

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté chicken, diced onion, and minced garlic in olive oil until browned.
o Add cumin, turmeric, ginger, and salt, cook for 1 minute.
o Add chicken broth and lentils, simmer until chicken is cooked and lentils are
tender.
o Stir in chopped cilantro.
o Tear flatbread into pieces and place in a serving dish.
o Pour chicken an d sauce over the bread and serve warm.
Rice and Peas

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup rice
o 1 cup coconut milk
o 1 cup water
o 1/2 cup kidney beans
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1 teaspoon thyme
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic until softened.
o Add rice, coconut milk, water, kidney beans, thyme, and salt.
o Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until rice is tender.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound pork shoulder
o 1/2 cup duck fat
o 1/4 cup white wine
o 1 teaspoon thyme
o 1 teas poon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Cut pork into small pieces.
o Cook pork with duck fat, wine, thyme, salt, and pepper in a pot over low heat
until very tender (about 3 hours).
o Shred pork with a fork and pack into jars.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 cup Arborio rice
o 4 cups chicken broth
o 1/2 cup white wine
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese
o 2 tablespoons butter
o 1 tablespoon olive oil

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Heat broth in a pot and keep warm.
o Sauté diced onion and  minced garlic in olive oil until translucent.
o Add rice and cook until lightly toasted.
o Pour in wine and cook until absorbed.
o Add broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly until absorbed.
o Continue until rice is creamy and tender.
o Stir in butter and gr ated Parmesan cheese.
o Serve immediately.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 potatoes
o 1 small onion
o 1/4 cup flour
o 1 egg
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper
o Oil for frying

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Grate potatoes and onion, then squeeze out excess moisture.
o Mix with flour, beaten egg, salt, and pepper.
o Form mixture into patties.
o Fry in hot oil until golden on both sides.
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 head red cabbage
o 1 small onion
o 1 apple

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Shred cabbage and slice onion and apple.
o Sauté onion in a pot until softened.
o Add cabbage, apple, vinegar, sugar, water, salt, and pepper.
o Simmer for 45 minutes until cabbage is tender.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1/2 pound kefalotyri cheese
o 1/4 cup flour
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 lemon

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Cut cheese into slices.
o Dredge cheese in flour.
o Heat olive oil in a pan and fry cheese until golden on both sides.
o Squeeze lemon ju ice over the top and serve immediately.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 tomatoes
o 1 cucumber
o 1 small red onion
o 1/4 cup olives
o 1/4 cup green beans
o 2 hard -boiled eggs
o 1 can tuna
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar
o 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.
o Blanch green beans until tender.
o Arrange tomatoes, cucumber, onion, green beans, olives, and tuna on a plate.
o Quarter hard -boiled eggs and add to the salad.
o Whisk olive oil, vinegar, mustard, and salt, then drizzle over the salad.
o Toss gently and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups shredded chicken
o 1 small onion
o 1 carrot
o 1 apple
o 1/4 cup raisins
o 1/4 cup mayonnaise
o 1/4 cup parsley
o 1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Dice onion, grate carrot, and chop apple.
o Mix shredded chicken with onion, carrot, apple, raisins, mayonnaise, chopped
parsley, and salt.
o Serve chilled.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound salted cod
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/2 cup flour
o 1/4 cup water
o 1 teaspoon thyme
o 1 teaspoon salt
o Oil for frying

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Soak salted cod in water overnight, then rinse and flake.
o Mix cod with diced onion, minced garlic, flour, water, thyme, and salt.
o Form mixture into fritters.
o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 2 cups flour
o 1/4 cup oil
o 1/2 cup water
o 2 potatoes
o 1/2 cup peas
o 1 small onion
o 1 teaspoon cumin
o 1 teaspoon coriander

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix flour, oil, and water to form a dough, then let rest.
o Boil and mash potatoes, then mix with peas, diced onion, and spices.
o Roll dough into circles, cut in half, and form cones.
o Fill cones with potato mixture and seal edges.
o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Serve warm.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound chicken breast
o 1/4 cup coconut milk
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce
o 2 tablespoons peanut butter
o 1 tablespoon curry powder
o 1 tablespoon brown sugar
o Skewers

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Cut chicken into strips and thread onto skewers.
o Mix coconut milk, soy sauce, peanut butter, curry powder, and brown sugar in a
bowl.
o Marinate chicken in the mixture for at least 1 hour.
o Grill or broil until cooked through.
o Serve with peanut sauce.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 head cabbage
o 1 tablespoon sea salt
o 1 teaspoon caraway seeds
• Instr uctions :
o Shred cabbage and mix with sea salt and caraway seeds.
o Pack cabbage into a jar and press down to release juices.
o Cover and let ferment at room temperature for 1 -2 weeks.
o Store in the refrigerator and serve as needed.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 smal l onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1 bell pepper

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Sauté diced onion, minced garlic, and diced bell pepper until softened.
o Add diced tomatoes, cumin, paprika, and salt, simmer for 10 minutes.
o Make wells in the sauce and crack eggs into each well.
o Cover and cook until eggs are set.
o Garnish with chopped parsley and serve.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 pound chicken thighs
o 1/4 cup yogurt
o 2 tablespoons lemon juice
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1 teaspoon cumin
o 1 teaspoon paprika
o 1 teaspoon turmeric
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Mix yogurt, lemon juice, minced garlic, cumin, paprika, turmeric, salt, and pepper
in a bowl.
o Marinate chicken in the mixture for at least 2 hours.
o Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
o Arrange chicken on a baking sheet and roast for 25 -30 minutes until cooked
through.
o Slice and serve with pita bread and toppings.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 potatoes
o 4 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1/4 cup lemon juice
o 1 teaspo on salt

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Boil potatoes until tender, then mash.
o Blend mashed potatoes with minced garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, and salt until
smooth.

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 1 green papaya
o 2 tomatoes
o 1 carrot
o 2 cloves garlic
o 2 tablespoons fish sauce
o 2 tablespoons lime juice
o 1 tablespoon sugar
o 1 tablespoon peanuts
o 1-2 Thai chilies

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Peel and shred green papaya and carrot.
o Crush garlic and chilies in a mortar and pestle.
o Add fish sauce, lime juice, a nd sugar, mix well.
o Toss shredded papaya, carrot, and sliced tomatoes with the dressing.
o Garnish with crushed peanuts and serve.
Sopa de Tortilla

sections.title: • Ingredients :
sections.content:
o 4 corn tortillas
o 1 tablespoon vegetable oil
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 4 cups chicken broth
o 2 tomatoes
o 1 teaspoon cumin
o 1 avocado
o 1/4 cup cilantro

sections.title: • Instructions :
sections.content:
o Cut tortillas into strips and fry in oil until crispy.
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in a pot until translucent.
o Add diced tomatoes and cumin, cook for 5 minutes.
o Pour in chicken bro th and bring to a boil.
o Simmer for 10 minutes.
o Serve soup topped with tortilla strips, diced avocado, and chopped cilantro.

extracted_text.1:
o Scramble eggs in the same pan.  
o Add noodles, fish sauce, tamarind paste, sugar, and lime juice, stir to combine.  
o Add bean sprouts, cooked shrimp, and chopped green onions.  
o Garnish with crushed peanuts and serve.  
 
Pajeon (Pancakes)  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 cup flour  
o 1 cup water  
o 1 egg  
o 1/2 cup green onions  
o 1/2 cup seafood (optional)  
o 1 tablespoon soy sauce  
o 1 tablespoon sesame oil  
• Instructions : 
o Mix flour, water, and beaten egg in a bowl.  
o Add chopped green onions and seafood (if using).  
o Heat sesame oil in a pan and pour in  batter.  
o Cook until golden on both sides.  
o Serve with soy sauce for dipping.  
 
Pan con Tomate  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 baguette  
o 4 tomatoes  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1/4 cup olive oil  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
• Instructions :

o Rub toasted bread with cut  garlic cloves.  
o Grate tomatoes and spread on bread.  
o Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.  
o Serve immediately.  
 
Paneer Tikka  
• Ingredients :

o 1 teaspoon turmeric

bowl.  
o Add paneer cubes and marinate for at least 1 hour.  
o Thread paneer onto skewers.  
o Grill or broil until golden, turning occasionally.  
o Serve warm.

o 1 small red onion

o Toss well and serve.

o 1/4 cup wate r 
o 1/2 teaspoon salt

o Roll dough into thin circles.  
o Fry in hot oil until crispy.  
o Drain on paper towels and serve.  
 
Patatas Bravas  
• Ingredients : 
o 4 potatoes  
o 1/4 cup olive oil
extracted_text.3:

o 1 cup okra

o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

o Stir in spinach and okra, cook until tender.

• Instructions :

o Arrange chicken on a baking sheet and roast for 25 -30 minutes until cooked 
through.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Pico de Gallo  
• Ingredients :
extracted_text.4:

o 1 teaspoon salt

o Chop cilantro.  
o Combine all ingredients in a bowl.  
o Squeeze lime juice over the mixture and add salt.  
o Mix well and serve.  
 
Pimientos de Padrón  
• Ingredients :

o Add Padrón peppers and sauté until blistered and tender.

• Ingredients :

o Heat oil in a pan and fry plantain slices until crispy.  
o Drain on paper towels and sprinkle with salt.  
o Serve warm.

• Ingredients :

o 4 cups water  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 2 tablespoons butter  
o 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese  
• Instructions : 
o Bring water and salt to a boil.  
o Gradually whisk in cornmeal.  
o Reduce heat and cook, stirring constantly, until thickened (about 30 minutes).
extracted_text.5:
o Stir in butter and Parmesan cheese.  
o Serve warm.

o 1 tablespoon vinegar  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper  
• Instructions : 
o Boil potatoes until tender, then dice.  
o Hard -boil eggs, then chop.  
o Mix potatoes, eggs, diced onion, mayonnaise, mustard, vinegar, salt, and pepper.  
o Chill for at least 1 hour before serving.  
 
Pretzels  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast  
o 1 teaspoon sugar  
o 1 cup warm water  
o 3 cups flour  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/4 cup baking soda  
o 1 egg  
o Coarse salt  
• Instructions : 
o Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy.  
o Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture.  
o Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled.  
o Divide dough into pieces and roll into ropes, then shape into pretzels.  
o Boil water with baking soda and dip pretzels in the solution.  
o Place on a baking sheet, brush with beaten egg, and sprinkle with coarse salt.  
o Bake a t 450°F (230°C) for 12 -15 minutes until golden.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Pulao  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 cup basmati rice  
o 2 cups water  
o 1 small onion
extracted_text.6:

o 1/2 cup peas  
o 1 teaspoon cumin  
o 1 teaspoon coriander  
o 1 teaspoon turmeric

o 1 teaspoon salt

• Instructions : 
o Rinse rice and soak in water for 30 minutes.  
o Heat oil in a pan and sauté diced onion until translucent.  
o Add diced carrot, peas, cumin, coriander, turmeric, and garam masala, cook for 1 
minute.  
o Drain rice and add to the pan, sti r to coat with spices.

o Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until rice is tender and water is absorbed.  
o Add salt to taste and serve.

o Heat oil in a pan.  
o Place a tortilla in the pan and sprinkle with cheese, chicken, and cilantro.

o Cut into wedges and serve.

• Ingredients : 
o 1 pie crust  
o 6 slices bacon  
o 1 small onion  
o 1 cup grated Gruyère cheese  
o 3 eggs  
o 1 cup heavy cream  
o 1/2 teaspoon salt  
o 1/4 teaspoon pepper  
• Instructions :
extracted_text.7:

o Cook bacon until crispy, then crumble.  
o Sauté diced onion in bacon fat until softened.  
o Place pie crust in a pie dish and sprinkle with bacon, onion, and cheese.  
o Beat eggs with cream, salt, and pepper, then pour over the filling.  
o Bake for 30 -35 minut es until set and golden.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Quindim

o 1/4 cup butter  
o 10 egg yolks

• Instructions :

o Make wells in the sauce and crack eggs into each well.

o Garnish with chopped parsley and serve.  
 
Shawarma  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 pound chicken thighs  
o 1/4 cup yogurt  
o 2 tablespoons lemon juice  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1 teaspoon cumin  
o 1 teaspoon paprika  
o 1 teaspoon turmeric  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper  
• Instructions : 
o Mix yogurt, lemon juice, minced garlic, cumin, paprika, turmeric, salt, and pepper 
in a bowl.  
o Marinate chicken in the mixture for at least 2 hours.  
o Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).  
o Arrange chicken on a baking sheet and roast for 25 -30 minutes until cooked 
through.  
o Slice and serve with pita bread and toppings.  
 
Skordalia  
• Ingredients : 
o 4 potatoes  
o 4 cloves garlic  
o 1/4 cup olive oil  
o 1/4 cup lemon juice  
o 1 teaspo on salt  
• Instructions : 
o Boil potatoes until tender, then mash.  
o Blend mashed potatoes with minced garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, and salt until 
smooth.
extracted_text.15:
o Serve as a dip or side dish.  
 
Som Tum (Green Papaya Salad)  
• Ingredients : 
o 1 green papaya  
o 2 tomatoes  
o 1 carrot  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 2 tablespoons fish sauce  
o 2 tablespoons lime juice  
o 1 tablespoon sugar  
o 1 tablespoon peanuts  
o 1-2 Thai chilies  
• Instructions : 
o Peel and shred green papaya and carrot.  
o Crush garlic and chilies in a mortar and pestle.  
o Add fish sauce, lime juice, a nd sugar, mix well.  
o Toss shredded papaya, carrot, and sliced tomatoes with the dressing.  
o Garnish with crushed peanuts and serve.  
 
Sopa de Tortilla  
• Ingredients : 
o 4 corn tortillas  
o 1 tablespoon vegetable oil  
o 1 small onion  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 4 cups chicken broth  
o 2 tomatoes  
o 1 teaspoon cumin  
o 1 avocado  
o 1/4 cup cilantro  
• Instructions : 
o Cut tortillas into strips and fry in oil until crispy.  
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in a pot until translucent.  
o Add diced tomatoes and cumin, cook for 5 minutes.  
o Pour in chicken bro th and bring to a boil.  
o Simmer for 10 minutes.  
o Serve soup topped with tortilla strips, diced avocado, and chopped cilantro.
